subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lynn helped Minnesota reach the Super Bowl but also engineered what proved to be one of the worst trades in N.F.L. history, a deal to land Herschel Walker.
snippet: Mr. Lynn helped Minnesota reach the Super Bowl but also engineered what proved to be one of the worst trades in N.F.L. history, a deal to land Herschel Walker.
